label: What is Coinfest Asia?
desc: Coinfest immerses you directly into adoption, innovation, and emerging markets in Asia. Held in Bali - Indonesia, the event will be rather unique and not structured like a typical conference, giving all participants a platform to engage and network in a casual setting. Coinfest Asia is hosted by Coinvestasi, Indonesia’s #1 crypto media (an Indonesia Crypto Network company).

label: Who will attend Coinfest Asia 2024?
desc: This event is perfect for you who is a founder or C-level of your company, a crypto and Web3 enthusiast, a fund manager, a product manager, an NFT creator, a brand partnership leader, a VC analyst, a program developer, an art & NFT collector, a marketing expert—everyone who is interested in gaining insight & networking in Web3 industry.

label: Are there any side events happening?
desc: Prepare yourself for not only 2 days of Coinfest Asia but also a week full of side events during Coinfest Week.
